<features> ['Connect advanced SCSI multiport applications to RAID controllers', 'Connector 1: (1) VHDCI-68 Male', 'Connector 2: (1) MD68 Male', 'Available in lengths up to 6ft', 'Lifetime Warranty']
response:
The JBL Northridge EC35 3-Way Dual 5-Inch Center-Channel Speakers are perfect for creating a truly immersive sound experience in this luxuriously appointed cabin. The 5-1/4-inch shielded PolyPlas woofers provide deep bass while the 3-inch shielded PolyPlas drivers deliver crisp midrange tones. Additionally, the 3/4-inch shielded titanium-laminate dome tweeter ensures clear treble notes. With its straight-line signal path crossover network, the speaker system delivers clean, uninterrupted audio without any distortion or interference. For added convenience, the speakers feature gold-plated 5-way binding posts for secure connections.

Meanwhile, the Philips 20PS40S 20” TV offers stunning visual clarity thanks to its nearly flat 20-inch screen. Its 3-line comb filter reduces dot crawl and blurred edges, resulting in a crystal-clear image. Furthermore, the TV’s video noise reduction minimizes picture grain, allowing viewers to enjoy movies and shows in optimal quality. It also comes equipped with a 240-minute sleep timer, auto picture, auto lock, and auto sound functions, making it easy to watch content at any time of day. Lastly, the TV has composite-, component-, and S-video inputs as well as A/V inputs in both the front and back, providing plenty of options when connecting devices.

Finally, the C2G/Cables to Go 20710 LVD/SE VHDCI .8mm 68-Pin Male to SCSI-3 MD68 Male Thumbscrew Cable allows users to connect advanced SCSI multiport applications to RAID controllers. This cable features a connector 1: (1) VHDCI-68 Male and a connector 2: (1) MD68 Male, so users can easily transfer data between two different ports. Available in lengths up to six feet, this cable is ideal for use in home offices, businesses, and other professional settings.

input: Panasonic SC-DK2 5-DVD Home Theater Compact Stereo System (Discontinued by Manufacturer) ['5-DVD/CD changer, dual auto reverse cassette decks, and AM/FM digitally synthesized tuner', 'Dolby Digital decoder', '5-speaker system with total output power of 290 watts in home-theater mode'] Toshiba 46H83 46-Inch HDTV Projection TV ['46-inch widescreen HD-compatible projection television with DVI-HDTV input; 43.375 x 40.5 x 21.875 inches (W x H x D)', 'CrystalScan HDSC coverts all 480i and 480p signals (as from progressive-scan DVD players and DTV set-top boxes) to high-definition 1080i', '3D Y/C digital comb filter with Vertical Contour Correction accurately processes RF (broadcast, VCR) and composite-video (DVD, VCR, camcorder) signals', 'HD Window dual-tuner POP with PIP sound', 'PowerFocus HD II CRTs offer 10 percent more brightness and 25 percent better sharpness than standard CRTs'] C2G 02711 DB9 M/F Serial RS232 Extension Cable, Beige (6 Feet, 1.82 Meters) ['Extend your RS-232 serial cable for more flexibility', 'Extend an existing DB9 cable up to 100ft', 'Put peripherals in the most convenient place', 'Available in beige and black', 'Lifetime Warranty', 'Don't sacrifice convenience when determining where to place your hardware!', 'A DB9 extension cable can give you the flexibility to extend a computer peripheral wherever you need it.', 'Each extension cable comes fully shielded to prevent unwanted EMI/RFI interference,', 'Connector thumbscrews provide a quick and easy connection every time.', '\n Extend an existing DB9 cable up to 100 Feet\n ', '\n Place peripherals in the most convenient location\n ', '\n Available in beige and black\n ', 'Designed in various colors to look great in any space.', 'Fully molded cable design delivers excellent strain relief.', 'All lines are wired straight through.']
response: The Panasonic SC-DK2 5-DVD Home Theater Compact Stereo System offers a truly immersive movie watching experience. With its 5-disc changer, dual auto reverse cassette decks, and AM/FM digitally synthesized tuner, this stereo system will keep you entertained for hours. The Dolby Digital decoder ensures crystal clear audio quality while the 5-speaker system with total output power of 290 watts in home-theater mode creates a powerful surround sound effect. This compact stereo system also includes a remote control so you don’t have to get off the couch to adjust the volume or change tracks. For those who want to enjoy movies at home without sacrificing style, the Toshiba 46H83 46-Inch HDTV Projection TV is perfect. Its 46-inch widescreen HD-compatible projection television with DVI-HDTV input allows users to watch movies in stunning clarity. It also has a CrystalScan HDSC converter which converts all 480i and 480p signals (from progressive scan DVD players and DTV set top boxes) to high definition 1080i. Additionally, the 3D Y/C digital comb filter with vertical contour correction accurately processes RF (broadcast, VCR), and composite video (DVD, VCR, camcorder) signals. Finally, the PowerFocus HDII CRTs offer 10% more brightness and 25% better sharpness than standard CRTs. If you’re looking for a way to connect multiple devices together, then the C2G 02711 DB9 M/F Serial RS232 Extension Cable is just what you need. This 6 foot long extension cable extends your RS-232 serial cable for more flexibility. It also allows you to put peripherals in the most convenient places. Each extension cable comes fully shielded to prevent unwanted EMI/RFI interference, connector thumb screws provide a quick and easy connection every time, and it even comes with a lifetime warranty.

50.3 x 27.8 x 4.9 inches (W x H x D)', '1 DVI direct-digital input, 2 ColorStream HD component-video inputs for ultimate quality from DTV receivers and progressive-scan DVD players', "Toshiba PixelPure technology produces a picture that's consistently clear, deep, and accurate", '1,024 x 768 native pixel resolution; 3D Y/C (4 MB, 10-bit) digital comb filter removes blurred edges between colors and reduces dot crawl', '10 watts per channel audio power x 2; SRS TruSurround and Dolby Virtual Surround produce enveloping sound from just 2 speakers'] C2G 09453 DB9 M/F Serial RS232 Extension Cable, Beige (50 Feet, 15.24 Meters) ['Extend your RS-232 serial cable for more flexibility', 'Extend an existing DB9 cable up to 100ft', 'Put peripherals in the most convenient place', 'Available in beige and black', 'Lifetime Warranty', "Don't sacrifice convenience when determining where to place your hardware!", 'A DB9 extension cable can give you the flexibility to extend a computer peripheral wherever you need it.', 'Each extension cable comes fully shielded to prevent unwanted EMI/RFI interference,', 'Connector thumbscrews provide a quick and easy connection every time.', '\n Extend an existing DB9 cable up to 100 Feet\n ', '\n Place peripherals in the most convenient location\n ', '\n Available in beige and black\n ', 'Designed in various colors to look great in any space.', 'Fully molded cable design delivers excellent strain relief.', 'All lines are wired straight through.']
response:
The Panasonic SC-AK410 300-watts 5-CD shelf system offers a luxuriously spacious environment for listening to music or watching movies while aboard the cruise liner. The built-in 5 CD changer allows passengers to enjoy hours of entertainment without having to switch discs manually. Additionally, the unit’s dual well cassette deck enables users to listen to old favorites as they sail away. With its powerful 300-watt output, this system will fill even the largest cabins with rich, full-bodied sound.

For those who prefer to watch movies during their voyage, the Panasonic SC-AK410 300-watts 5-CD shelf system also includes a digital tuner with 30 FM/AM presets so guests can stay connected to their favorite stations. Its large, colorful LED screen displays ID3 tag information such as artist and song titles, making it easier to find exactly what you want to hear. Furthermore, the unit’s Super Sound EQ feature lets users adjust the bass, midrange, and treble levels according to personal preference. This ensures that everyone gets the best possible sound no matter which movie or album they choose.

Finally, the Panasonic SC-AK410 300-watts 5-CD shelf system has a built-in sleep timer and remote control, allowing passengers to easily set the volume level and turn off the system after use. These features make it ideal for enjoying relaxation before bedtime or taking a nap during the day.
